implosion of work orders Implode Work Order
section.para: When you implode a work order, you delete the work order's material requirements and work order operations. Only work orders with exploded (E) status can be imploded. If the work order has been released (R) or is in-process (I), it may not be imploded. Implosion changes a work order's status from exploded (E) back to open (O). To implode a work order, go to Manufacture > Work Order > Implode. The following screen will appear:
When imploding a work order, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the work order number of the work order you want to implode.
